subhash jose wrote:

>         I am trying to write junits for a class which access a static 
> method of another class. I am getting static initialization error and 
> the test case fails, though the functionality is correct.

Can you test the second class on its own with JUnit? If not, then there 
is your problem. If so, then I'd need to see code to be able to offer 
more advice.
